ai-pli-tv-pvr1.5:1.1_0: While he has sexual intercourse, he stem from his offenses, and disorderses stem from disorders of offenses,
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.5:1.2_0: While he is making amends for an offense, he stem from one nature and wind;
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.5:1.3_0: They don’t make the body and speech, and the mind. ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.5:2.1_0: disrespect, urinates in water, or spits on the edge of the six classes of offenses, or spheres steming from disposed of offenses?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.5:2.2_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, or spits on the edge of one, and all over,
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.5:2.3_0: The body and the mind, but not from speech.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.5:3.1_0: The fifth section consisting of probation is finished.
